entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 02:00 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure: 104.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2
